doc.name: StringSplit
doc.description: This actor reads an input string and splits it into an array of strings. The separator parameter is a regular expression that determines where the split should occur. The default behavior will split the input at newline characters.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: A specification of the separator used to split the string. The default is "\n", which results in splitting the string at newline characters.
If true, then trim spaces around each resulting string. This is a boolean that defaults to true.
